title: Snow removal from driveway and walkway
description: Need help clearing snow from my driveway (2 car spaces) and front walkway after the recent snowfall. The snow is about 15cm deep. I have a shovel and salt available.

title: Help moving furniture to second floor
description: I need assistance moving a dresser, bookshelf, and two boxes up to the second floor. Everything is already packed and ready to go. Should take about an hour.

title: Clear snow from back deck and stairs
description: Looking for someone to shovel snow off my back deck and stairs. The deck is medium-sized and the stairs have 8 steps. Ice salt will be provided.

title: Rake leaves and bag yard waste
description: Need help raking leaves from front and back yard. Bags will be provided. The yard is medium-sized with several trees. Great for someone who enjoys outdoor work!

title: Assemble new bookshelf from IKEA
description: Purchased a large IKEA bookshelf that needs assembly. All parts and tools are included. Instructions are in the box. Looking for someone patient and good with their hands!

title: Shovel snow from entire property
description: Large property including long driveway, walkways, and patio area. This will take 2-3 hours of work. Snowblower available if you know how to use it, otherwise shovels provided.

title: Fix squeaky door and tighten cabinet handles
description: Have a bedroom door that squeaks and several kitchen cabinet handles that are loose. Basic tools will be provided. Should be quick fixes for someone handy!

title: Move boxes from garage to storage unit
description: Need to transport approximately 15 boxes from my garage to a storage unit nearby (5-minute drive). Boxes are medium weight. Vehicle available for transport.

title: Trim hedges and weed garden beds
description: Front yard hedges need trimming and three garden beds need weeding. Hedge trimmers and gardening tools provided. Prefer someone with gardening experience.

title: Shovel walkway and spread ice salt
description: Simple job - clear the front walkway from sidewalk to door and spread ice salt. Walkway is about 20 feet long. All supplies provided.

title: Assemble outdoor storage shed
description: New outdoor storage shed needs to be assembled in the backyard. Instructions included but it's a 2-person job. Should take 2-3 hours. All hardware and tools provided.

title: Clear snow from roof overhang
description: Heavy snow accumulation on roof overhang above front door needs to be safely removed. Ladder will be provided. Must be comfortable working at height.

title: Help load moving truck
description: Moving to a new place and need help loading furniture and boxes into a rental truck. Heavy lifting involved. Should take about 2 hours. Two people preferred.

title: Replace weather stripping on front door
description: Front door weather stripping is worn and needs replacement. Weather stripping already purchased. Looking for someone handy who can measure and install properly.

title: Clean out gutters before winter
description: Gutters are full of leaves and debris and need to be cleaned before more snow. Ladder provided. Front and back of house. Safety is priority!

title: Shovel driveway and walkways
description: Standard snow removal for single-car driveway and two walkways. About 20cm of snow. I can help a little but need someone to do the heavy work.

title: Assemble new dining table and 4 chairs
description: Just bought a dining set that needs assembly. Table and 4 chairs. All pieces are there with instructions. Looking for someone experienced with furniture assembly.

title: Install new mailbox post
description: Old mailbox post is rotting and needs replacement. New post and mailbox purchased. Need someone to dig out old post, set new one in concrete. Post hole digger available.

title: Move couch and reorganize living room
description: Need to rearrange living room furniture including moving a heavy couch, coffee table, and TV stand. Also want to move an armchair from bedroom down to living room.

title: Pile and bag leaves from entire yard
description: Large yard with lots of mature trees. Need all leaves raked, piled, and bagged for municipal pickup. Will require several hours of work. Rake and bags provided.
